pr_title: Fixed scope for quarkus-junit5-internal dep in qute-deployment

timeline.message: Fixed scope for quarkus-junit5-internal dep in qute-deployment

timeline.bodyText: Looks good but I wonder if test shouldn't be the default scope for quarkus-junit5-internal declared in the BOM?
timeline.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: I probably wouldn't mind but we agreed at the beginning not to add scopes to the BOM, as it is considered a bad practice.
replies.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Please please don't add scopes to the BOM :). It's very very confusing for someone consuming that dependency
replies.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: @geoand @aloubyansky that's ok, I'm not going to change anything... I can live with that ;-). But in general I find it very convenient if "test" dependencies have the test scope. In this particular case, 99% of consumers would have to add <scope>test</scope>. Just saying...
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: I completely understand. But if you are not expecting that, it can be super confusing
replies.author: geoand
